metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1138 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Inappropriate implementation in Web Cursor in Google Chrome prior to100.0.4896.60 allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the rendererprocess to obscure the contents of the Omnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTMLpage.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
